Data.No CBTL business unless registered: The firm must not carry on any activity that would constitute consumer buy-to-let mortgage business as defined in Part 3 of the Mortgage Credit Directive Order 2015 (SI 910/2015) unless registered as a consumer buy-to-let mortgage firm

Data.Not permitted to canvass off trade premi: The firm is not permitted to canvass regulated borrower-lender-supplier agreements or regulated consumer hire agreements off trade premises

Data.Financial Promotions for own firm, ARs a: This firm can approve its own financial promotions as well as those of members of its wider group and, in certain circumstances, those of its appointed representatives.
